Description: Book of the Dead of Padiamunnebnesuttawy; sheet 12(fourteen fragments); full colour vignettes; cursive Hieroglyphic text.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: George Annesley, 2nd Earl of Mountnorris
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (156)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57514) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57514)
